comment: I hope you have a wonderful day!
This is the worst thing ever.
Thanks so much for your help.
Such a pleasure to work with you.
This is garbage and so are you.
You're the worst person I know.
It was really nice seeing you.
Wow, you are really good at making everyone around you uncomfortable
Oh, great job! I have never seen anyone mess up that badly before.
Yeah, because that is exactly what we needed. More of your genius ideas.
Oh, great job! I have never seen anyone mess up that badly before. Truly impressive.
Oh, you are amazing! Just like a broken clock.
What a surprise, you have done it again. Failed spectacularly!
You have got this! I mean, not really.
I love how you always have the perfect solution. Just kidding, you have no idea what you are doing.
Oh, that was a brilliant move. I can not believe no one thought of that before.
Perfect, just what we needed! Another suggestion from the person who always gets it wrong.
Oh, sure! Because nothing says great idea like a suggestion from you.
You really outdid yourself this time! I am amazed, truly.
Wow, that is such a great solution. I can not believe no one else thought of it before.
Great job! It is not like I could have figured that out on my own.
